poem:
### Diplomatic Conversations

In the paper, a minister condemns,  
another calls plans madness,  
their words like birds crashing  
against the northern sky,  
shouting to be heard.  
Yet here, morning light falls  
on the kitchen table,  
my coffee steaming calmly,  
undeterred by the distant rumble  
of nations locked in their chess game.
